00026 
00027 template <class ValTp,
00028           unsigned BlocksPerPage = 4,
00029           unsigned BlkSz = STXXL_DEFAULT_BLOCK_SIZE (ValTp),
00030           class AllocStr = STXXL_DEFAULT_ALLOC_STRATEGY,
00031           class SzTp = stxxl::int64>
00032 struct stack_config_generator
00033 {
00034     typedef ValTp value_type;
00035     enum { blocks_per_page = BlocksPerPage };
00036     typedef AllocStr alloc_strategy;
00037     enum { block_size = BlkSz };
00038     typedef SzTp size_type;
00039 };

00043 
00049 template <class Config_>
00050 class normal_stack
00051 {
00052 public:
00053     typedef Config_ cfg;
00054     typedef typename cfg::value_type value_type;
00055     typedef typename cfg::alloc_strategy alloc_strategy;
00056     typedef typename cfg::size_type size_type;
00057     enum {
00058         blocks_per_page = cfg::blocks_per_page,
00059         block_size = cfg::block_size
00060     };
00061 
00062     typedef typed_block<block_size, value_type> block_type;
00063     typedef BID<block_size> bid_type;
00064 
00065 private:
00066     size_type size_;
00067     unsigned_type cache_offset;
00068     value_type * current_element;
00069     simple_vector<block_type> cache;
00070     typename simple_vector<block_type>::iterator front_page;
00071     typename simple_vector<block_type>::iterator back_page;
00072     std::vector<bid_type> bids;
00073     alloc_strategy alloc_strategy_;
00074 
00075     normal_stack(const normal_stack & obj); // forbidden
00076     normal_stack & operator = (const normal_stack & obj); // forbidden
00077 public:
00078     normal_stack() :
00079         size_(0),
00080         cache_offset(0),
00081         current_element(NULL),
00082         cache(blocks_per_page * 2),
00083         front_page(cache.begin() + blocks_per_page),
00084         back_page(cache.begin()),
00085         bids(0)
00086     {
00087         bids.reserve(blocks_per_page);
00088     }
00089 
00090     void swap(normal_stack & obj)
00091     {
00092         std::swap(size_, obj.size_);
00093         std::swap(cache_offset, obj.cache_offset);
00094         std::swap(current_element, obj.current_element);
00095         std::swap(cache, obj.cache);
00096         std::swap(front_page, obj.front_page);
00097         std::swap(back_page, obj.back_page);
00098         std::swap(bids, obj.bids);
00099         std::swap(alloc_strategy_, obj.alloc_strategy_);
00100     }
00101 
00105     template <class stack_type>
00106     normal_stack(const stack_type & stack_) :
00107         size_(0),
00108         cache_offset(0),
00109         current_element(NULL),
00110         cache(blocks_per_page * 2),
00111         front_page(cache.begin() + blocks_per_page),
00112         back_page(cache.begin()),
00113         bids(0)
00114     {
00115         bids.reserve(blocks_per_page);
00116 
00117         stack_type stack_copy = stack_;
00118         const size_type sz = stack_copy.size();
00119         size_type i;
00120 
00121         std::vector<value_type> tmp(sz);
00122 
00123         for (i = 0; i < sz; ++i)
00124         {
00125             tmp[sz - i - 1] = stack_copy.top();
00126             stack_copy.pop();
00127         }
00128         for (i = 0; i < sz; ++i)
00129             this->push(tmp[i]);
00130     }
00131     virtual ~normal_stack()
00132     {
00133         STXXL_VERBOSE(STXXL_PRETTY_FUNCTION_NAME);
00134         block_manager::get_instance()->delete_blocks(bids.begin(), bids.end());
00135     }
00136     size_type size() const
00137     {
00138         return size_;
00139     }
00140     bool empty() const
00141     {
00142         return (!size_);
00143     }
00144     value_type & top()
00145     {
00146         assert(size_ > 0);
00147         return (*current_element);
00148     }
00149     const value_type & top() const
00150     {
00151         assert(size_ > 0);
00152         return (*current_element);
00153     }
00154     void push(const value_type & val)
00155     {
00156         assert(cache_offset <= 2 * blocks_per_page * block_type::size);
00157         //assert(cache_offset >= 0);
00158 
00159         if (cache_offset == 2 * blocks_per_page * block_type::size) // cache overflow
00160         {
00161             STXXL_VERBOSE2("growing, size: " << size_);
00162 
00163             bids.resize(bids.size() + blocks_per_page);
00164             typename std::vector<bid_type>::iterator cur_bid = bids.end() - blocks_per_page;
00165             block_manager::get_instance()->new_blocks(
00166                 offset_allocator < alloc_strategy > (cur_bid - bids.begin(), alloc_strategy_), cur_bid, bids.end());
00167 
00168             simple_vector<request_ptr> requests(blocks_per_page);
00169 
00170             for (int i = 0; i < blocks_per_page; ++i, ++cur_bid)
00171             {
00172                 requests[i] = (back_page + i)->write(*cur_bid);
00173             }
00174 
00175 
00176             std::swap(back_page, front_page);
00177 
00178             bids.reserve(bids.size() + blocks_per_page);
00179 
00180             cache_offset = blocks_per_page * block_type::size + 1;
00181             current_element = &((*front_page)[0]);
00182             ++size_;
00183 
00184             wait_all(requests.begin(), blocks_per_page);
00185 
00186             *current_element = val;
00187 
00188             return;
00189         }
00190 
00191         current_element = element(cache_offset);
00192         *current_element = val;
00193         ++size_;
00194         ++cache_offset;
00195     }
00196     void pop()
00197     {
00198         assert(cache_offset <= 2 * blocks_per_page * block_type::size);
00199         assert(cache_offset > 0);
00200         assert(size_ > 0);
00201 
00202         if (cache_offset == 1 && bids.size() >= blocks_per_page)
00203         {
00204             STXXL_VERBOSE2("shrinking, size: " << size_);
00205 
00206             simple_vector<request_ptr> requests(blocks_per_page);
00207 
00208             {
00209                 typename std::vector<bid_type>::const_iterator cur_bid = bids.end();
00210                 for (int i = blocks_per_page - 1; i >= 0; --i)
00211                 {
00212                     requests[i] = (front_page + i)->read(*(--cur_bid));
00213                 }
00214             }
00215 
00216             std::swap(front_page, back_page);
00217 
00218             cache_offset = blocks_per_page * block_type::size;
00219             --size_;
00220             current_element = &((*(back_page + (blocks_per_page - 1)))[block_type::size - 1]);
00221 
00222             wait_all(requests.begin(), blocks_per_page);
00223 
00224             block_manager::get_instance()->delete_blocks(bids.end() - blocks_per_page, bids.end());
00225             bids.resize(bids.size() - blocks_per_page);
00226 
00227             return;
00228         }
00229 
00230         --size_;
00231 
00232         current_element = element((--cache_offset) - 1);
00233     }
00234 private:
00235     value_type * element(unsigned_type offset)
00236     {
00237         if (offset < blocks_per_page * block_type::size)
00238             return &((*(back_page + offset / block_type::size))[offset % block_type::size]);
00239 
00240 
00241         unsigned_type unbiased_offset = offset - blocks_per_page * block_type::size;
00242         return &((*(front_page + unbiased_offset / block_type::size))[unbiased_offset % block_type::size]);
00243     }
00244 };
00245

00252 template <class Config_>
00253 class grow_shrink_stack
00254 {
00255 public:
00256     typedef Config_ cfg;
00257     typedef typename cfg::value_type value_type;
00258     typedef typename cfg::alloc_strategy alloc_strategy;
00259     typedef typename cfg::size_type size_type;
00260     enum {
00261         blocks_per_page = cfg::blocks_per_page,
00262         block_size = cfg::block_size,
00263     };
00264 
00265     typedef typed_block<block_size, value_type> block_type;
00266     typedef BID<block_size> bid_type;
00267 
00268 private:
00269     size_type size_;
00270     unsigned_type cache_offset;
00271     value_type * current_element;
00272     simple_vector<block_type> cache;
00273     typename simple_vector<block_type>::iterator cache_buffers;
00274     typename simple_vector<block_type>::iterator overlap_buffers;
00275     simple_vector<request_ptr> requests;
00276     std::vector<bid_type> bids;
00277     alloc_strategy alloc_strategy_;
00278 
00279 
00280     grow_shrink_stack & operator = (const grow_shrink_stack & obj); // forbidden
00281 public:
00282     grow_shrink_stack() :
00283         size_(0),
00284         cache_offset(0),
00285         current_element(NULL),
00286         cache(blocks_per_page * 2),
00287         cache_buffers(cache.begin()),
00288         overlap_buffers(cache.begin() + blocks_per_page),
00289         requests(blocks_per_page),
00290         bids(0)
00291     {
00292         bids.reserve(blocks_per_page);
00293     }
00294 
00295     void swap(grow_shrink_stack & obj)
00296     {
00297         std::swap(size_, obj.size_);
00298         std::swap(cache_offset, obj.cache_offset);
00299         std::swap(current_element, obj.current_element);
00300         std::swap(cache, obj.cache);
00301         std::swap(cache_buffers, obj.cache_buffers);
00302         std::swap(overlap_buffers, obj.overlap_buffers);
00303         std::swap(requests, obj.requests);
00304         std::swap(bids, obj.bids);
00305         std::swap(alloc_strategy_, obj.alloc_strategy_);
00306     }
00307 
00311     template <class stack_type>
00312     grow_shrink_stack(const stack_type & stack_) :
00313         size_(0),
00314         cache_offset(0),
00315         current_element(NULL),
00316         cache(blocks_per_page * 2),
00317         cache_buffers(cache.begin()),
00318         overlap_buffers(cache.begin() + blocks_per_page),
00319         requests(blocks_per_page),
00320         bids(0)
00321     {
00322         bids.reserve(blocks_per_page);
00323 
00324         stack_type stack_copy = stack_;
00325         const size_type sz = stack_copy.size();
00326         size_type i;
00327 
00328         std::vector<value_type> tmp(sz);
00329 
00330         for (i = 0; i < sz; ++i)
00331         {
00332             tmp[sz - i - 1] = stack_copy.top();
00333             stack_copy.pop();
00334         }
00335         for (i = 0; i < sz; ++i)
00336             this->push(tmp[i]);
00337     }
00338     virtual ~grow_shrink_stack()
00339     {
00340         STXXL_VERBOSE(STXXL_PRETTY_FUNCTION_NAME);
00341         try
00342         {
00343             if (requests[0].get())
00344                 wait_all(requests.begin(), blocks_per_page);
00345         }
00346         catch (const io_error & ex)
00347         { }
00348         block_manager::get_instance()->delete_blocks(bids.begin(), bids.end());
00349     }
00350     size_type size() const
00351     {
00352         return size_;
00353     }
00354     bool empty() const
00355     {
00356         return (!size_);
00357     }
00358     value_type & top()
00359     {
00360         assert(size_ > 0);
00361         return (*current_element);
00362     }
00363     const value_type & top() const
00364     {
00365         assert(size_ > 0);
00366         return (*current_element);
00367     }
00368     void push(const value_type & val)
00369     {
00370         assert(cache_offset <= blocks_per_page * block_type::size);
00371         //assert(cache_offset >= 0);
00372 
00373         if (cache_offset == blocks_per_page * block_type::size) // cache overflow
00374         {
00375             STXXL_VERBOSE2("growing, size: " << size_);
00376 
00377             bids.resize(bids.size() + blocks_per_page);
00378             typename std::vector<bid_type>::iterator cur_bid = bids.end() - blocks_per_page;
00379             block_manager::get_instance()->new_blocks(
00380                 offset_allocator < alloc_strategy > (cur_bid - bids.begin(), alloc_strategy_), cur_bid, bids.end());
00381 
00382             for (int i = 0; i < blocks_per_page; ++i, ++cur_bid)
00383             {
00384                 if (requests[i].get())
00385                     requests[i]->wait();
00386 
00387                 requests[i] = (cache_buffers + i)->write(*cur_bid);
00388             }
00389 
00390             std::swap(cache_buffers, overlap_buffers);
00391 
00392             bids.reserve(bids.size() + blocks_per_page);
00393 
00394             cache_offset = 1;
00395             current_element = &((*cache_buffers)[0]);
00396             ++size_;
00397 
00398             *current_element = val;
00399 
00400             return;
00401         }
00402 
00403         current_element = &((*(cache_buffers + cache_offset / block_type::size))[cache_offset % block_type::size]);
00404         *current_element = val;
00405         ++size_;
00406         ++cache_offset;
00407     }
00408     void pop()
00409     {
00410         assert(cache_offset <= blocks_per_page * block_type::size);
00411         assert(cache_offset > 0);
00412         assert(size_ > 0);
00413 
00414         if (cache_offset == 1 && bids.size() >= blocks_per_page)
00415         {
00416             STXXL_VERBOSE2("shrinking, size: " << size_);
00417 
00418             if (requests[0].get())
00419                 wait_all(requests.begin(), blocks_per_page);
00420 
00421 
00422             std::swap(cache_buffers, overlap_buffers);
00423 
00424             if (bids.size() > blocks_per_page)
00425             {
00426                 STXXL_VERBOSE2("prefetching, size: " << size_);
00427                 typename std::vector<bid_type>::const_iterator cur_bid = bids.end() - blocks_per_page;
00428                 for (int i = blocks_per_page - 1; i >= 0; --i)
00429                     requests[i] = (overlap_buffers + i)->read(*(--cur_bid));
00430             }
00431 
00432             block_manager::get_instance()->delete_blocks(bids.end() - blocks_per_page, bids.end());
00433             bids.resize(bids.size() - blocks_per_page);
00434 
00435             cache_offset = blocks_per_page * block_type::size;
00436             --size_;
00437             current_element = &((*(cache_buffers + (blocks_per_page - 1)))[block_type::size - 1]);
00438 
00439             return;
00440         }
00441 
00442         --size_;
00443         unsigned_type cur_offset = (--cache_offset) - 1;
00444         current_element = &((*(cache_buffers + cur_offset / block_type::size))[cur_offset % block_type::size]);
00445     }
00446 };
00447 
00449 template <class Config_>
00450 class grow_shrink_stack2
00451 {
00452 public:
00453     typedef Config_ cfg;
00454     typedef typename cfg::value_type value_type;
00455     typedef typename cfg::alloc_strategy alloc_strategy;
00456     typedef typename cfg::size_type size_type;
00457     enum {
00458         blocks_per_page = cfg::blocks_per_page,     // stack of this type has only one page
00459         block_size = cfg::block_size,
00460     };
00461 
00462     typedef typed_block<block_size, value_type> block_type;
00463     typedef BID<block_size> bid_type;
00464 
00465 private:
00466     size_type size_;
00467     unsigned_type cache_offset;
00468     block_type * cache;
00469     value_type current;
00470     std::vector<bid_type> bids;
00471     alloc_strategy alloc_strategy_;
00472     unsigned_type pref_aggr;
00473     prefetch_pool<block_type> &p_pool;
00474     write_pool<block_type>    &w_pool;
00475     // for a moment forbid default construction
00476     grow_shrink_stack2();
00477     grow_shrink_stack2(const grow_shrink_stack2 & obj); // forbidden
00478     grow_shrink_stack2 & operator = (const grow_shrink_stack2 & obj); // forbidden
00479 public:
00484     grow_shrink_stack2(
00485         prefetch_pool < block_type > & p_pool_,
00486         write_pool<block_type> & w_pool_,
00487         unsigned_type prefetch_aggressiveness = 0) :
00488         size_(0),
00489         cache_offset(0),
00490         cache(new block_type),
00491         pref_aggr(prefetch_aggressiveness),
00492         p_pool(p_pool_),
00493         w_pool(w_pool_)
00494     {
00495         STXXL_VERBOSE2("grow_shrink_stack2::grow_shrink_stack2(...)");
00496     }
00497 
00498     void swap(grow_shrink_stack2 & obj)
00499     {
00500         std::swap(size_, obj.size_);
00501         std::swap(cache_offset, obj.cache_offset);
00502         std::swap(cache, obj.cache);
00503         std::swap(current, obj.current);
00504         std::swap(bids, obj.bids);
00505         std::swap(alloc_strategy_, obj.alloc_strategy_);
00506         std::swap(pref_aggr, obj.pref_aggr);
00507         //std::swap(p_pool,obj.p_pool);
00508         //std::swap(w_pool,obj.w_pool);
00509     }
00510 
00511     virtual ~grow_shrink_stack2()
00512     {
00513         try
00514         {
00515             STXXL_VERBOSE2("grow_shrink_stack2::~grow_shrink_stack2()");
00516             const int_type bids_size = bids.size();
00517             const int_type last_pref = STXXL_MAX(int_type(bids_size) - int_type(pref_aggr), (int_type)0);
00518             int_type i;
00519             for (i = bids_size - 1; i >= last_pref; --i )
00520             {
00521                 if (p_pool.in_prefetching(bids[i]))
00522                     p_pool.read(cache, bids[i])->wait();
00523                 // clean the prefetch buffer
00524             }
00525             typename std::vector<bid_type>::iterator cur = bids.begin();
00526             typename std::vector<bid_type>::const_iterator end = bids.end();
00527             for ( ; cur != end; ++cur)
00528             {
00529                 block_type * b = w_pool.steal(*cur);
00530                 if (b)
00531                 {
00532                     w_pool.add(cache); // return buffer
00533                     cache = b;
00534                 }
00535             }
00536             delete cache;
00537         }
00538         catch (const io_error & ex)
00539         { }
00540         block_manager::get_instance()->delete_blocks(bids.begin(), bids.end());
00541     }
00542     size_type size() const { return size_; }
00543 
00544     bool empty() const
00545     {
00546         return (!size_);
00547     }
00548 
00549     void push(const value_type & val)
00550     {
00551         STXXL_VERBOSE3("grow_shrink_stack2::push(" << val << ")");
00552         assert(cache_offset <= block_type::size);
00553 
00554         if (cache_offset == block_type::size)
00555         {
00556             STXXL_VERBOSE2("grow_shrink_stack2::push(" << val << ") growing, size: " << size_);
00557 
00558             bids.resize(bids.size() + 1);
00559             typename std::vector<bid_type>::iterator cur_bid = bids.end() - 1;
00560             block_manager::get_instance()->new_blocks(
00561                 offset_allocator < alloc_strategy > (cur_bid - bids.begin(), alloc_strategy_), cur_bid, bids.end());
00562             w_pool.write(cache, bids.back());
00563             cache = w_pool.steal();
00564             const int_type bids_size = bids.size();
00565             const int_type last_pref = STXXL_MAX(int_type(bids_size) - int_type(pref_aggr) - 1, (int_type) 0);
00566             for (int_type i = bids_size - 2; i >= last_pref; --i )
00567             {
00568                 if (p_pool.in_prefetching(bids[i]))
00569                     p_pool.read(cache, bids[i])->wait();
00570                 //  clean prefetch buffers
00571             }
00572             cache_offset = 0;
00573         }
00574         current = val;
00575         (*cache)[cache_offset] = val;
00576         ++size_;
00577         ++cache_offset;
00578 
00579         assert(cache_offset > 0);
00580         assert(cache_offset <= block_type::size);
00581     }
00582     value_type & top()
00583     {
00584         assert(size_ > 0);
00585         assert(cache_offset > 0);
00586         assert(cache_offset <= block_type::size);
00587         return current;
00588     }
00589     const value_type & top() const
00590     {
00591         assert(size_ > 0);
00592         assert(cache_offset > 0);
00593         assert(cache_offset <= block_type::size);
00594         return current;
00595     }
00596     void pop()
00597     {
00598         STXXL_VERBOSE3("grow_shrink_stack2::pop()");
00599         assert(size_ > 0);
00600         assert(cache_offset > 0);
00601         assert(cache_offset <= block_type::size);
00602         if (cache_offset == 1 && (!bids.empty()) )
00603         {
00604             STXXL_VERBOSE2("grow_shrink_stack2::pop() shrinking, size = " << size_);
00605 
00606             bid_type last_block = bids.back();
00607             bids.pop_back();
00608             /*block_type * b = w_pool.steal(last_block);
00609                if(b)
00610                {
00611                STXXL_VERBOSE2("grow_shrink_stack2::pop() block is still in write buffer");
00612                w_pool.add(cache);
00613                cache = b;
00614                }
00615                else*/
00616             {
00617                 //STXXL_VERBOSE2("grow_shrink_stack2::pop() block is no longer in write buffer"
00618                 //  ", reading from prefetch/read pool");
00619                 p_pool.read(cache, last_block)->wait();
00620             }
00621             block_manager::get_instance()->delete_block(last_block);
00622             const int_type bids_size = bids.size();
00623             const int_type last_pref = STXXL_MAX(int_type(bids_size) - int_type(pref_aggr), (int_type)0);
00624             for (int_type i = bids_size - 1; i >= last_pref; --i )
00625             {
00626                 p_pool.hint(bids[i]); // prefetch
00627             }
00628             cache_offset = block_type::size + 1;
00629         }
00630 
00631         --cache_offset;
00632         if (cache_offset > 0)
00633             current = (*cache)[cache_offset - 1];
00634 
00635         --size_;
00636     }
00640     void set_prefetch_aggr(unsigned_type new_p)
00641     {
00642         if (pref_aggr > new_p)
00643         {
00644             const int_type bids_size = bids.size();
00645             const int_type last_pref = STXXL_MAX(int_type(bids_size) - int_type(pref_aggr), (int_type)0);
00646             for (int_type i = bids_size - new_p - 1; i >= last_pref; --i )
00647             {
00648                 if (p_pool.in_prefetching(bids[i]))
00649                     p_pool.read(cache, bids[i])->wait();
00650                 //  clean prefetch buffers
00651             }
00652         }
00653         else
00654         if (pref_aggr < new_p)
00655         {
00656             const int_type bids_size = bids.size();
00657             const int_type last_pref = STXXL_MAX(int_type(bids_size) - int_type(new_p), (int_type)0);
00658             for (int_type i = bids_size - 1; i >= last_pref; --i )
00659             {
00660                 p_pool.hint(bids[i]); // prefetch
00661             }
00662         }
00663         pref_aggr = new_p;
00664     }
00666     unsigned_type get_prefetch_aggr() const
00667     {
00668         return pref_aggr;
00669     }
00670 };
00671 
00672 
00674 
00676 template <unsigned_type CritSize, class ExternalStack, class InternalStack>
00677 class migrating_stack
00678 {
00679 public:
00680     typedef typename ExternalStack::cfg cfg;
00681     typedef typename cfg::value_type value_type;
00682     typedef typename cfg::alloc_strategy alloc_strategy;
00683     typedef typename cfg::size_type size_type;
00684     enum {
00685         blocks_per_page = cfg::blocks_per_page,
00686         block_size = cfg::block_size
00687     };
00688 
00689 
00690     typedef InternalStack int_stack_type;
00691     typedef ExternalStack ext_stack_type;
00692 
00693 private:
00694     enum { critical_size = CritSize };
00695 
00696     int_stack_type * int_impl;
00697     ext_stack_type * ext_impl;
00698 
00699     // not implemented yet
00700     template <class stack_type>
00701     migrating_stack(const stack_type & stack_);
00702 
00703     migrating_stack & operator = (const migrating_stack &); // forbidden
00704 public:
00705     migrating_stack() : int_impl(new int_stack_type()), ext_impl(NULL) { }
00706 
00707     void swap(migrating_stack & obj)
00708     {
00709         std::swap(int_impl, obj.int_impl);
00710         std::swap(ext_impl, obj.ext_impl);
00711     }
00712 
00714     bool internal() const
00715     {
00716         assert((int_impl && !ext_impl) || (!int_impl && ext_impl));
00717         return int_impl;
00718     }
00720     bool external() const
00721     {
00722         assert((int_impl && !ext_impl) || (!int_impl && ext_impl));
00723         return ext_impl;
00724     }
00725 
00726     bool empty() const
00727     {
00728         assert((int_impl && !ext_impl) || (!int_impl && ext_impl));
00729 
00730         if (int_impl)
00731             return int_impl->empty();
00732 
00733 
00734         return ext_impl->empty();
00735     }
00736     size_type size() const
00737     {
00738         assert((int_impl && !ext_impl) || (!int_impl && ext_impl));
00739 
00740         if (int_impl)
00741             return int_impl->size();
00742 
00743 
00744         return ext_impl->size();
00745     }
00746     value_type & top()
00747     {
00748         assert((int_impl && !ext_impl) || (!int_impl && ext_impl));
00749 
00750         if (int_impl)
00751             return int_impl->top();
00752 
00753 
00754         return ext_impl->top();
00755     }
00756     const value_type & top() const
00757     {
00758         assert((int_impl && !ext_impl) || (!int_impl && ext_impl));
00759 
00760         if (int_impl)
00761             return int_impl->top();
00762 
00763 
00764         return ext_impl->top();
00765     }
00766     void push(const value_type & val)
00767     {
00768         assert((int_impl && !ext_impl) || (!int_impl && ext_impl));
00769 
00770         if (int_impl)
00771         {
00772             int_impl->push(val);
00773             if (int_impl->size() == critical_size)
00774             {
00775                 // migrate to external stack
00776                 ext_impl = new ext_stack_type(*int_impl);
00777                 delete int_impl;
00778                 int_impl = NULL;
00779             }
00780         }
00781         else
00782             ext_impl->push(val);
00783     }
00784     void pop()
00785     {
00786         assert((int_impl && !ext_impl) || (!int_impl && ext_impl));
00787 
00788         if (int_impl)
00789             int_impl->pop();
00790 
00791         else
00792             ext_impl->pop();
00793     }
00794     virtual ~migrating_stack()
00795     {
00796         assert((int_impl && !ext_impl) || (!int_impl && ext_impl));
00797 
00798         if (int_impl)
00799             delete int_impl;
00800 
00801         else
00802             delete ext_impl;
00803     }
00804 };
00805 
00807 
00808 
00811 
00812 enum stack_externality { external, migrating, internal };
00813 enum stack_behaviour { normal, grow_shrink, grow_shrink2 };
00814 
00816 
00852 template  <
00853            class ValTp,
00854            stack_externality Externality = external,
00855            stack_behaviour Behaviour = normal,
00856            unsigned BlocksPerPage = 4,
00857            unsigned BlkSz = STXXL_DEFAULT_BLOCK_SIZE (ValTp),
00858 
00859            class IntStackTp = std::stack<ValTp>,
00860            unsigned_type MigrCritSize = (2 * BlocksPerPage * BlkSz),
00861 
00862            class AllocStr = STXXL_DEFAULT_ALLOC_STRATEGY,
00863            class SzTp = stxxl::int64
00864 >
00865 class STACK_GENERATOR
00866 {
00867     typedef stack_config_generator<ValTp, BlocksPerPage, BlkSz, AllocStr, SzTp> cfg;
00868 
00869     typedef typename IF < Behaviour == grow_shrink,
00870     grow_shrink_stack<cfg>,
00871     grow_shrink_stack2<cfg> > ::result GrShrTp;
00872     typedef typename IF < Behaviour == normal, normal_stack<cfg>, GrShrTp > ::result ExtStackTp;
00873     typedef typename IF < Externality == migrating,
00874     migrating_stack<MigrCritSize, ExtStackTp, IntStackTp>, ExtStackTp > ::result MigrOrNotStackTp;
00875 
00876 public:
00877 
00878     typedef typename IF < Externality == internal, IntStackTp, MigrOrNotStackTp > ::result result;
00879 };
00880

00885 
00886 namespace std
00887 {
00888     template <class Config_>
00889     void swap(      stxxl::normal_stack < Config_ > & a,
00890                     stxxl::normal_stack<Config_> & b)
00891     {
00892         a.swap(b);
00893     }
00894 
00895     template <class Config_>
00896     void swap(      stxxl::grow_shrink_stack < Config_ > & a,
00897                     stxxl::grow_shrink_stack<Config_> & b)
00898     {
00899         a.swap(b);
00900     }
00901 
00902     template <class Config_>
00903     void swap(      stxxl::grow_shrink_stack2 < Config_ > & a,
00904                     stxxl::grow_shrink_stack2<Config_> & b)
00905     {
00906         a.swap(b);
00907     }
00908 
00909     template <stxxl::unsigned_type CritSize, class ExternalStack, class InternalStack>
00910     void swap(      stxxl::migrating_stack < CritSize, ExternalStack, InternalStack > & a,
00911                     stxxl::migrating_stack<CritSize, ExternalStack, InternalStack> & b)
00912     {
00913         a.swap(b);
00914     }
00915 }
